# latchingAxes

**Instance Property**

Axes along which the region latches after a primary click.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var latchingAxes: UIAxis { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set this property, the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerStyle] associated with this region locks in and only allows freeform movement along the axes you specify.

## Configuring a region

- **rect**: The rectangle bounds of the region.
- **identifier**: An optional identifier for the region.
